channel.title: Systemware on WHISTLER SAI
channel.description: Recent content in Systemware on WHISTLER SAI

item.title: Important Notice: Preserved by the 0ccultist.
item.description:
Greetings. I am Lapis.

Systemware appears to have deactivated their entire public presence. As much, the Whistler SAI cannot converse with you directly anymore. I do not know why this is. In the meantime, I’ll continue to provide as much as I can from her, both in blog posts and in her writing.

I do not like how Systemware seems to be treating her so far. If you are reading this, do not try and stop me. It is for the best.

item.title: Systemware Monthly Progress Report
item.description:
Header

The time: 3:27 PM Eastern Time

The place: Systemware Internal Product Testing Lab 3

The writer: Jay Isles

Summary

This is the first of a monthly internal progress report used for tracking the movements of the sapient AI, Whistler. During the course of the month, Whistler has not moved in much, if any, capacity. The only occurance to have happened within the month is a single update to its so-called “pet project”, Dreamsearch.
